actions.committee: Committee on Commerce, Science, and Transportation
actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Commerce, Science, and Transportation.

official_title: A bill to require the placement of blast-resistant cargo containers on all commercial passenger aircraft.

summary.text: Amends federal transportation law to require that all commercial passenger aircraft be equipped with not less than one hardened, blast-resistant cargo container. Requires the Secretary of Homeland Security to distribute sufficient blast-resistant cargo containers to air carriers within 90 days after the completion of the Hardened Container Pilot Program.

titles.title: A bill to require the placement of blast-resistant cargo containers on all commercial passenger aircraft.
